mapper.select: SELECT sa.id,sa.spu_id,sa.sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name, sv.id sale_attr_value_id,sv.sale_attr_value_name FROM `spu_sale_attr` sa JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id WHERE sa.spu_id=#{spuId}

SELECT sa.id,sa.spu_id,sa.sale_attr_id,sa.sale_attr_name, sv.id sale_attr_value_id,sv.sale_attr_value_name , IF(sav.`sale_attr_value_id` IS NULL, '0','1') is_checked FROM `spu_sale_attr` sa JOIN `spu_sale_attr_value` sv ON sa.sale_attr_id=sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id=sv.spu_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value sav ON sv.id=sav.`sale_attr_value_id` AND sav.`sku_id`=#{skuId} WHERE sa.spu_id=#{spuId}
